page.title: 14COWLEY MANOR
page.content: Cowley Manor is in a beautiful setting in the Cotswolds.Lewis Carroll stayed there.He was sitting at the top of the avenue of trees when he saw a rabbit go down a hole,that is where he is supposed to have got the idea for Alice in Wonder Land.Gloucestershire County Council owns Cowley Manor but during the 1.W.W. Capt. Heber_Percy owned it.the grounds are very beautiful. There are three lakes with islands. 195 acres of surrounding land are also part of the manor.People come from all over the world to stay. There are 20 bedrooms and 6 state rooms.The busiest months of the year are October and November.At the manor they do 22-23 school courses a year, there are also holidays, educaational courses and conferences. People who stay here like the grounds very much.
